articles.author: Esther Webber
articles.title: Britain cranks up taxes by £40B and gambles on growth - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Labour’s Rachel Reeves signaled that the new British government plans record tax rises on the wealthy and on business.
articles.content:
Reeves promised to end the freeze on income tax thresholds sooner than expected, maintained the freeze on fuel duty, and cut the duty on a pint of beer by a penny. 
As she explained in remarks to he… [+1394 chars]
